mapper.select: /* AdmPrvcMngMapper.selectPrvcMngListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1
/* AdmPrvcMngMapper.selectPrvcMngList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* AdmPrvcMngMapper.selectPrvcMngExcel */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
